title: CSUN Breakfast Seminars
desc: Larry Twersky is CEO of Timer Cap, LLC. which markets a patented "smart" prescription cap that tells a patient how long it has been since they last took their medication. The new products connects (IoT) to an Apple or Android device to provide Relevant Reminders to patients, families, and caregivers to help improve healthier outcomes and save lives. Larry is a CSUN alumnus, a national recognized visionary entrepreneur and business executive, and the foremost expert in healthcare digital marketing. He has served as president of GoldMine Software Corporation's CRM division, president of 1-800-DENTIST.
